author: mariadalfonso
body:
As discussed at yesteday reco meeting,
here the descoped puppiMET version of PR #15429:
removed various puppiPhoton changes until understood differences between miniAOD and AOD
See discussion in (81X) #15562 #15669

benefit from this PR
1) difference in the forward puppi jets and removed PU dependency in MET due to changes in CommonTools/PileupAlgos/python/Puppi_cff.py 
2) the sequence in makePuppiesFromMiniAOD is ready to be used for offline, no changes from makePuppies that run on AOD are expected

@slava77 @violatingcp @zdemirag
title: Descoped puppi update (80X)
